column1: Smoque BBQ////I would say this is the best BBQ in Chicago.. Great Beef Brisket
column3: Peach Cobbler and Fries.. Service is great.. staff always friendly.. and it is BYOB.. not much seating
column4: but we always take ours to go.. that way you don't have to wait in line.. call ahead and do it early as they sometimes run out of ribs..
